## About Me

Greetings! My Name is **Ronit Anandani**. I am a senior at Conant High School and I look towards exploring the world of Data Science using R. In fact, this website was made using R!

## About the Project
*The Impact of COVID-19 on the Stock Market and its Sectors*

This project analyzes the effects of COVID-19 upon stock market sectors like technology, commerce, and others

### Goals

* Demonstrate the immediate and long-term impacts of the pandemic

* Understand which markets had the impact that they did

  + Based off of trends and reasoning
